name: Stardust Code
description:
Controls:

Q: switch the binary number your orb shoots out. (Above character's head)

Left click and aim your mouse to shoot binary lasers from your orb.

WASD Movement

Important to Remember:

0 = False

1 = True

Its all about binary codes. 0 and 1. Make sure the falling star's binary numbers match its given path. How far will reach? 

This game was made within 3 hours for the Trijam 101 with the theme: Binary.

This was also made for the Burnout Jam with the theme: Arcade.

Unity Font used:

Free Pixel Font: Thaleah - TinyWorlds
